sections.content: Diat combines rich text editing with diagram editing. It's a powerful tool for visual thinking and documentation.
Useable in your favourite, Diat offers a seamless, performant editing experience.
Bring rich text documents, images, and summarised website articles together in an interactive, logical flow.

aboutSection.title: Why Diat?
contentParagraphs: Diat uses powerful, modern development technologies to deliver a seamless, performant editing experience.
Designed with user-friendliness in mind, the core philosophy of Diat is to make the process of creating and editing documents as simple and intuitive as possible.
Diat uses simple controls and a comprehensive help guide to make it easy to get started.
Take a look around and see what Diat can do for you.
